name: CEO
definition: Chief Executive Officer: The highest-ranking person in a company or organization.

children.name: Manager
children.definition: Oversees and coordinates activities within a department.

children.name: Foreman
children.definition: A person in charge of a group of workers.

children.name: Workers
children.definition: Employees who carry out the tasks assigned by the Foreman.
